T02D2056:154a-1: yaksha k'i li k'i la r'a dza s'a dha nam /
T02D2056:154a-3: gnod spyin gyi rgyal po phur bus 'debs pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02D2056:154a-4: yaksha k'i lo n'a ma sa tya ba di tritta
T02D2056:154a-5: pra ta:ta sha tya ha pinda da di ma se
T02D2056:154a-6: me ka m'a na pra yatstsham tu sv'a h'a /
T02D2056:154a-8: de nas zan za ba'i dus su /
T02D2056:154a-9: zan gyi phud la sngags lan bdun bzlas la /
T02D2056:154a-10: dben pa'i sar lci bas byugs pa'i mandala byas la
T02D2056:154a-11: nyi ma re re zhing gnod spyin la zan dbul
T02D2056:154a-12: lo // zla gcig song nas nyi ma re la 'dis nor re ster ro //
T02D2056:154a-13: zla ba gnyis pa la 'dis nor nyi shu ster ba'am yang na ston par 'gyur ro //
T02D2056:154a-14: zla ba gsum pa la nyi ma re la 'dis nor brgya tsho re ster ro //
T02D2056:154a-15: zla ba bzhi pa la 'dis nor stong ster ro //
T02D2056:154a-16: zla ba lnga pa la k'i li k'i la zhes
T02D2056:154a-17: bya ba'i gnod spyin gyi rgyal po mthong bar 'gyur
T02D2056:154b-0: nor dang gter shin tu mang ba ster bar @154b 'gyur ro //
T02D2056:154b-1: nad med pa dang bar chad mi 'byung ba dang blo dang ldan par byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D2056:154b-2: zla ba drug na nam mkha' la 'gro bar nus shing rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
T02D2056:154b-3: zla ba bdun na ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
T02D2056:154b-4: zla ba brgyad na lha'i gnas su 'gro bar nus par 'gyur ro //
T02D2056:154b-5: cho ga 'di rnams thams cad byas la g-yas gyi
T02D2056:154b-6: khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo dang mthe bong rtse
T02D2056:154b-8: phyag rgya 'di dang sngags kyis zan rdog gcig byin des zos zin pa'i dus su /
T02D2056:154b-9: kha bshal ba'i chu lan gsum byin par bya'o //
